code: import React from'react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./CompareResults.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CompareResults=()=>{const location=useLocation();const{selectedUniversities}=location.state||{selectedUniversities:[]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"compare-results-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Comparison Result"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"comparison-container",children:selectedUniversities.map((uni,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"university-comparison-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:uni.University}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Ranking: ",uni.Ranking]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["City: ",uni.City]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Tuition Fee: ",uni.Tuition_fee]})]},index))})]});};export default CompareResults;
